content:
As a heads-up, the TSC and Board decided to change the RC program to no longer require voting in elections. We know that this requirement caused some contributors to opt against accepting nominations to the program in the past, so I wanted to raise awareness here in case people want to reconsider those nominations now

Update the RC Program to not require voting by tschneidereit 路 Pull Request #130 路 bytecodealliance/governance
The TSC has received feedback from multiple people that they're not comfortable accepting nominations to become a Recognized Contributor, because they don't want to vote in elections to the...
